sqlMap.select:
select id, category_name, category_describe, category_level, all_parent_id, parent_id, is_wap, is_app, is_pc, create_time, remarks, seo_title, seo_keyword, seo_describe, weight from t_category
order by $orderByClause$

select id, category_name, category_describe, category_level, all_parent_id, parent_id, is_wap, is_app, is_pc, create_time, remarks, seo_title, seo_keyword, seo_describe, weight from t_category where id = #id:BIGINT#
sqlMap.insert:
insert into t_category (id, category_name, category_describe, category_level, all_parent_id, parent_id, is_wap, is_app, is_pc, create_time, remarks, seo_title, seo_keyword, seo_describe, weight) values (#id:BIGINT#, #categoryName:VARCHAR#, #categoryDescribe:VARCHAR#, #categoryLevel:INTEGER#, #allParentId:VARCHAR#, #parentId:BIGINT#, #isWap:INTEGER#, #isApp:INTEGER#, #isPc:INTEGER#, #createTime:TIMESTAMP#, #remarks:VARCHAR#, #seoTitle:VARCHAR#, #seoKeyword:VARCHAR#, #seoDescribe:VARCHAR#, #weight:INTEGER#)
select LAST_INSERT_ID()

insert into t_category
id
category_name
category_describe
category_level
all_parent_id
parent_id
is_wap
is_app
is_pc
create_time
remarks
seo_title
seo_keyword
seo_describe
weight
)
values
#id:BIGINT#
#categoryName:VARCHAR#
#categoryDescribe:VARCHAR#
#categoryLevel:INTEGER#
#allParentId:VARCHAR#
#parentId:BIGINT#
#isWap:INTEGER#
#isApp:INTEGER#
#isPc:INTEGER#
#createTime:TIMESTAMP#
#remarks:VARCHAR#
#seoTitle:VARCHAR#
#seoKeyword:VARCHAR#
#seoDescribe:VARCHAR#
#weight:INTEGER#
)
select LAST_INSERT_ID()
sqlMap.update:
update t_category
id = #record.id:BIGINT#
category_name = #record.categoryName:VARCHAR#
category_describe = #record.categoryDescribe:VARCHAR#
category_level = #record.categoryLevel:INTEGER#
all_parent_id = #record.allParentId:VARCHAR#
parent_id = #record.parentId:BIGINT#
is_wap = #record.isWap:INTEGER#
is_app = #record.isApp:INTEGER#
is_pc = #record.isPc:INTEGER#
create_time = #record.createTime:TIMESTAMP#
remarks = #record.remarks:VARCHAR#
seo_title = #record.seoTitle:VARCHAR#
seo_keyword = #record.seoKeyword:VARCHAR#
seo_describe = #record.seoDescribe:VARCHAR#
weight = #record.weight:INTEGER#

update t_category set id = #record.id:BIGINT#, category_name = #record.categoryName:VARCHAR#, category_describe = #record.categoryDescribe:VARCHAR#, category_level = #record.categoryLevel:INTEGER#, all_parent_id = #record.allParentId:VARCHAR#, parent_id = #record.parentId:BIGINT#, is_wap = #record.isWap:INTEGER#, is_app = #record.isApp:INTEGER#, is_pc = #record.isPc:INTEGER#, create_time = #record.createTime:TIMESTAMP#, remarks = #record.remarks:VARCHAR#, seo_title = #record.seoTitle:VARCHAR#, seo_keyword = #record.seoKeyword:VARCHAR#, seo_describe = #record.seoDescribe:VARCHAR#, weight = #record.weight:INTEGER#

update t_category
category_name = #categoryName:VARCHAR#
category_describe = #categoryDescribe:VARCHAR#
category_level = #categoryLevel:INTEGER#
all_parent_id = #allParentId:VARCHAR#
parent_id = #parentId:BIGINT#
is_wap = #isWap:INTEGER#
is_app = #isApp:INTEGER#
is_pc = #isPc:INTEGER#
create_time = #createTime:TIMESTAMP#
remarks = #remarks:VARCHAR#
seo_title = #seoTitle:VARCHAR#
seo_keyword = #seoKeyword:VARCHAR#
seo_describe = #seoDescribe:VARCHAR#
weight = #weight:INTEGER#
where id = #id:BIGINT#

update t_category set category_name = #categoryName:VARCHAR#, category_describe = #categoryDescribe:VARCHAR#, category_level = #categoryLevel:INTEGER#, all_parent_id = #allParentId:VARCHAR#, parent_id = #parentId:BIGINT#, is_wap = #isWap:INTEGER#, is_app = #isApp:INTEGER#, is_pc = #isPc:INTEGER#, create_time = #createTime:TIMESTAMP#, remarks = #remarks:VARCHAR#, seo_title = #seoTitle:VARCHAR#, seo_keyword = #seoKeyword:VARCHAR#, seo_describe = #seoDescribe:VARCHAR#, weight = #weight:INTEGER# where id = #id:BIGINT#
sqlMap.select:
select id, category_name, category_describe, category_level, all_parent_id, parent_id, is_wap, is_app, is_pc, create_time, remarks, seo_title, seo_keyword, seo_describe, weight from t_category
order by $orderByClause$
limit $pageInfo.start$ ,$pageInfo.pageSize$

select id, category_name, category_describe, category_level, all_parent_id, parent_id, is_wap, is_app, is_pc, create_time, remarks, seo_title, seo_keyword, seo_describe, weight from t_category where 1=1
and id =#id#

SELECT id,category_name as name, category_level as level from t_category where is_app = 1
parent_id = #parent#
order by weight desc

SELECT id,category_name as name, category_level as level from t_category where is_app = 1
parent_id = #parent#
order by weight desc
SELECT (SELECT tg.abbreviation_picture from t_goods as tg where tg.id=tcg.goodsid) AS image FROM t_category_goods as tcg WHERE tcg.CATEGORYID = #pcid# AND tcg.TYPE = 2 LIMIT 0,1

SELECT t.id, t.category_name AS `name`, t.category_level AS `level`, img.img_url AS imgUrl, t.category_describe as `describe` FROM t_category t LEFT JOIN t_category_img img ON t.id = img.category_id WHERE 1 = 1
and t.is_app=#isApp#
and t.is_wap=#isWap#
AND t.parent_id = #pid:BIGINT# GROUP BY t.id ORDER BY weight DESC

select id from t_category t where t.category_level=#categoryLevel#
and t.is_app=#isApp#
and t.is_wap=#isWap#
order by t.weight desc

select id from t_category t where t.category_level=#categoryLevel#
and t.is_pc=#isPc#
and t.is_wap=#isWap#
order by t.weight desc

SELECT t.id, t.category_name AS `name`, t.category_level AS `level`, img.img_url AS imgUrl, t.category_describe as `describe` FROM t_category t LEFT JOIN t_category_img img ON t.id = img.category_id WHERE 1 = 1
and t.is_pc=#isPc#
and t.is_wap=#isWap#
AND t.parent_id = #pid:BIGINT# GROUP BY t.id ORDER BY weight DESC
